mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION VALUES ( NULL, #{patCd}, #{memCd}, #{resMemCd}, #{depCd}, #{resReason}, #{resVdate}, NULL, NULL, 0, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT R.*,D.DEP_NAME, M.MEM_NAME as MEM_NAME,M2.MEM_NAME AS RES_MEM_NAME FROM RESERVATION AS R JOIN DEPARTMENT AS D ON R.DEP_CD = D.DEP_CD JOIN MEMBER AS M ON R.MEM_CD = M.MEM_CD JOIN MEMBER AS M2 ON R.RES_MEM_CD = M2.MEM_CD WHERE PAT_CD = #{patCd} ORDER BY RES_VDATE

SELECT R.*,D.DEP_NAME, M.MEM_NAME as MEM_NAME,M2.MEM_NAME AS RES_MEM_NAME FROM RESERVATION AS R JOIN DEPARTMENT AS D ON R.DEP_CD = D.DEP_CD JOIN MEMBER AS M ON R.MEM_CD = M.MEM_CD JOIN MEMBER AS M2 ON R.RES_MEM_CD = M2.MEM_CD WHERE RES_VDATE LIKE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), '%') ORDER BY RES_VDATE
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVATION SET RES_MHISTORY = #{resMHistory}, RES_DRUG = #{resDrug}, RES_CLINIC = #{resClinic} WHERE RES_CD = #{resCd}
